feed.title: Mealie Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Mealie: v1.9.0
entry.content:
Highlights

  • Lots of new contributors, thanks!!! üòç üöÄ
  • OpenAI as an option for recipe scraping, https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3690
  • Migrations are more fault tolerant to Safari-caused zip issues, https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3712

What's Changed

  • feat: Open AI Recipe Scraper by @michael-genson in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3690
  • feat: Added images to PWA shortcuts by @Choromanski in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3744
  • feat: Show nutrition on recipe print by @Asdoos in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3740
  • fix: Recipe Keeper Errors and Other Safari Issues by @michael-genson in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3712
  • fix: Make fractions in the ingredient list look a tiny bit nicer by @bartkummel in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3725
  • docs(auto): Update image tag, for release v1.8.0 by @github-actions in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3698
  • docs: Add doco for db changes by @boc-the-git in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3721
  • docs: Add n8n backup automation example guide by @Greirson in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3648
  • docs: Adjust badges in README by @boc-the-git in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3728
  • docs: Fix typo in python logging docs by @boc-the-git in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3736
  • docs: Provide meaningful URLs for some badges by @boc-the-git in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3742
  • fix(deps): update dependency openai to v1.31.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3700
  • fix(deps): update dependency pydantic-settings to v2.3.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3701
  • fix(deps): update dependency openai to v1.31.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3707
  • fix(deps): update dependency openai to v1.32.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3709
  • fix(deps): update dependency openai to v1.32.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3713
  • fix(deps): update dependency openai to v1.33.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3715
  • fix(deps): update dependency pydantic-settings to v2.3.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3723
  • fix(deps): update dependency orjson to v3.10.4 by @renovate in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3722
  • fix(deps): update dependency pydantic to v2.7.4 by @renovate in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3729
  • fix(deps): update dependency openai to v1.34.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3730
  • fix(deps): update dependency pydantic-settings to v2.3.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3733
  • fix(deps): update dependency orjson to v3.10.5 by @renovate in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3734
  • chore(deps): update dependency ruff to v0.4.8 by @renovate in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3699
  • chore(deps): update dependency mkdocs-material to v9.5.26 by @renovate in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3705
  • chore(deps): update dependency pylint to v3.2.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3706
  • chore(deps): update dependency ruff to v0.4.9 by @renovate in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3737
  • chore(deps): update dependency mkdocs-material to v9.5.27 by @renovate in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3741
  • New Crowdin updates (Total: 4)

New Contributors

  • @Greirson made their first contribution in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3648
  • @bartkummel made their first contribution in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3725
  • @Choromanski made their first contribution in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3744
  • @Asdoos made their first contribution in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3740

Full Changelog: https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/compare/v1.8.0...v1.9.0

entry.title: New release for Mealie: v1.10.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: Revert "fix: Offline Shopping List Fixes" by @boc-the-git in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3835

Full Changelog: https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/compare/v1.10.0...v1.10.1

entry.title: New release for Mealie: v1.10.2
entry.content:
This puts a temporary fix in place for a timezone issue impacting the shopping list. The permanent fix should arrive in a few days at v1.10.3

What's Changed

  • fix: Temporary TZ Issue Fix For Shopping Lists by @michael-genson in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3850
  • docs(auto): Update image tag, for release v1.10.1 by @github-actions in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3836
  • chore(l10n): New Crowdin updates by @hay-kot in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3838

Full Changelog: https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/compare/v1.10.1...v1.10.2

entry.title: New release for Mealie: v1.11.0 - Lots of minor improvements/fixes
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: Show recipe tags on mobile view and meal plan by @AverageMarcus in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3864
  • feat: Push On Hand Items to Bottom Of Add To Shopping List Dialog by @michael-genson in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3862
  • feat: Internationalize sent emails by @p0lycarpio in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3818
  • feat: PWA Additions by @Choromanski in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3896
  • fix: Minor Typo by @michael-genson in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3855
  • fix: Restore Webhook Test Functionality by @michael-genson in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3857
  • fix: Make Mealie Timezone-Aware by @michael-genson in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3847
  • fix: Add a default value of list when a user's group is None by @cmintey in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3872
  • fix: Follow redirects during scraping by @zeskeertwee in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3875
  • fix: Bump other version numbers in GH workflow by @michael-genson in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3840
  • fix: Use env variable to get alembic config file in exporter by @litchipi in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3882
  • fix: Create directory used for Docker Secrets by @boc-the-git in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3888
  • fix: Convert Daily Schedule Time to UTC by @michael-genson in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3914
  • fix: task py:migrate description by @Kuchenpirat in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3932
  • fix: prevent postgres credentials leak by @hay-kot in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3895
  • fix: Offline Shopping List Fixes V2 - Electric Boogaloo by @michael-genson in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3837
  • fix: Homepage icon and text update by @tyme-dev in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3922
  • fix: Reduce search tolerance on organizers page by @michael-genson in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3950
  • fix(auto): Update pre-commit hooks by @github-actions in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3893

  • docs(auto): Update image tag, for release v1.10.2 by @github-actions in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3851
  • docs: Fix FAQ typos by @ekcom in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3866
  • docs: Update API Docs by @michael-genson in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3856
  • docs: Remove duplicated "step 2" by @boc-the-git in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3908
  • docs: Change allow signup to false by @boc-the-git in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3913
  • docs: Update swag.md by @j-antunes in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3961
  • fix(deps): update dependency openai to v1.35.10 by @renovate in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3843
  • fix(deps): update dependency openai to v1.35.12 by @renovate in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3873

entry.title: New release for Mealie: v1.12.0 - Image import via OpenAI
entry.content:
Highlights

  • Import recipes via an image, using OpenAI. https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3974

What's Changed

  • feat: Added fr-BE by @TheSuperBeaver in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/4004
  • feat: If there's only one shopping list, navigate directly to it by @boc-the-git in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3958
  • feat: Import + Translate recipe images with OpenAI by @michael-genson in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3974
  • feat: Seed support for plural units by @Choromanski in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3933
  • fix: recipe clean_time function missing translator argument on recursion by @Kuchenpirat in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3969
  • fix: Make recipe scraper cleaner more fault tolerant by @michael-genson in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3967
  • fix: Bump tzdata 2024.1 by @michael-genson in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3993
  • fix: Don't load from secrets dir if nonexistent or inaccessible by @anoadragon453 in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/4002
  • fix: Lint Python code with ruff by @cclauss in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3799
  • fix(auto): Update pre-commit hooks by @github-actions in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3987
  • fix(auto): Update pre-commit hooks by @github-actions in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/4020
